"Is there a problem with you? You make no sense! I am going to be the
replacement leader until your well, hello? head too thick?" Atma said...
----- Original Message -----
From: <logomorph@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, September 13, 2000 7:35 PM
Subject: Re: Goings on


>
> ::KitKat::
>
> She woke up and groaned.  She tried to stand, but fell back down. She
> wondered why on Cybertron she had the inclination to jumo from the
> ship.  She perked her ears up and hear the squablling of the other
> bots.  They were fighting for leadership.  She sighed and new that in
> her state, she couldn't challange for leadership.  And she needed
> help. Her body wasn't going to hold out without a CR.  She tried to
> stand agains and finally stood on her legs. She wasn't going to stay
> around let watch them get killed.  She walked over to Atma and the
> others.  She growled loudly, snapped and bared her teeth.  She raised
> the hair on her back and snarled. "NOW listen to me.  If you want to
> lead this pack, you will have to fight me.  I have tried to save your
> pelts over and over again.  Phobia saved us this last time. And I am
> grateful to him.  But now is not the time to fight amonst ourselves.
> We need to stick together and get ourselves a plan.  Now I have a
> plan if you want to hear it. If not. then walk.  I'm going to go and
> kill those blasted maximals.  But not this minute." she coughed and
> fell to the ground.  She looked up, still growling. "Now you can
> fight me now, or walk away. Or you can stay and we can kill
> those, "coughs,"maximals for all they did to us. Revenge, " she
> coughed and shook from the pain," REVENGE! "
>
> She could barely hold her head up. But she hoped she was able to keep
> them together for a little while longer.   She knew that even with
> only the five of them, they could attack and hurt them as baddly as
> they had been hurt.  She lowered her head and groaned.  She didn't
> care if they killed her any more.  But she still flet a sence of
> loyalty to them.  She trembled and coughed. Her chest hurt and she
> whined a bit.  She closed her eyes and hope the pain would stop.
>
>
>
>
